label: student_key_stage
description: string value of the key stage (grouping of grade levels) of the student answering the question; values can be KS1, KS2, KS3, KS4

label: question_difficulty
description: string value of the difficulty of the question relative to the grade level as estiamted by authors, values can be easy or hard

label: subject
description: subject domain of the question, values can be science or history

label: topic
description: the topic of the question, this is roughly equivalent to a learning standards. There are various values for this field

label: human_agree
description: wheter or not there was unanimous agreement between raters
